title: Katherine Schwarzenegger displays her love for husband Chris Pratt
text:
Katherine Schwarzenegger doesn't just wear her heart on her sleeve - but on her ears as well.

While co-hosting the Today Show with her mom Maria Shriver and Hoda Kotb on Wednesday, Hoda pointed out she was wearing some interesting earrings that said 'CP.'

'I was just looking at your cute earrings and I saw it says 'CP,'' she said about the stylish detail which stands for her husband's name, Chris Pratt.

Cute! While co-hosting the Today Show with her mom Maria Shriver and Hoda Kotb on Wednesday, Hoda pointed out Katherine Schwarzenegger was wearing some interesting earrings that said 'CP'

Mom jokes: Maria joked about how the initials are also the same as her brother's. The two shared a life before Katherine reminded her that she is married

The 29-year-old just couldn't hold back a smile as she said 'My hubby. I'm married!'

And that's when her mom piped in to joke around pointing out that she knows someone else who has the same initials.

'Those are also your brother's [initials],' she joked. Katherine thought that bit was funny and responded: 'I'm married. Welcome!'

'My hubby': Schwarzenegger was a proud newlywed on Today

Joking around: The three woman laughed at Maria's joke as Hoda made a signal to the cameras

Puppy love: Katherine got the chance to cuddle with a puppy while on the show promoting adopting for the #struttyourmutt event later this month

After the show, she took to her Instagram to share photos from the set including some of her holding onto a puppy that's up for adoption for the upcoming #struttyourmutt event.

'Thank you so much for having me on to Co-host today @hodaandjenna ! I had THE BEST TIME with my mama @mariashriver and the amazing @hodakotb ! And thank you @bestfriendsanimalsociety for bringing the cutest pups! Can't wait for #struttyourmutt event October 26th!,' she shared.

The brunette bombshell looked amazing as she sported her new short haircut and a burgundy and navy dress for the occasion.

Posing: The three women posed with the little puppy after the show

High five: Katherine appeared to have a good time as she joked around with Hoda while taping for the show

It's no wonder Chris holds a special place in her heart after their wedding back in June at San Ysidro Ranch in Montecito, California.

She wore a custom Giorgio Armani gown that she claimed was a 'once in a lifetime dress' on her Instagram.

'Yesterday was the best day of our lives! We became husband and wife in front of God, our families and those we love,' she said in the post. 'It was intimate, moving and emotional. We feel so blessed to begin this new chapter of our lives. We are so thankful to our families and our friends who stood with us, and grateful to Mr. Giorgio Armani, who created a once in a lifetime dress for me to wear, and for Chris, the perfect suit.'

The two got engaged back in January and met through her mother just last summer.
